title: 2004 CAF Champions League
text:
The 2004 CAF Champions League was the 40th edition of the <a href="CAF%20Champions%20League">CAF Champions League</a>, the <a href="Africa">Africa</a>'s premier club <a href="association%20football">football</a> tournament prize organized by the <a href="Confederation%20of%20African%20Football">Confederation of African Football</a> (CAF). <a href="Enyimba%20International%20F.C.">Enyimba</a> of <a href="Nigeria">Nigeria</a> defeated <a href="%C3%89toile%20du%20Sahel">Étoile du Sahel</a> of <a href="Tunisia">Tunisia</a> in the final to win their second title.
Qualifying rounds.
Preliminary round.
1 <a href="US%20Stade%20Tamponnaise">US Stade Tamponnaise</a> refused to participate; they were banned from CAF competitions for two years and fined $3000. <br>
2 <a href="AS%20Temp%C3%AAte%20Mocaf">AS Tempête Mocaf</a> and <a href="Ulinzi%20Stars">Ulinzi Stars</a> withdrew before 1st leg. <br>
3 <a href="ASC%20Nasr%20de%20Sebkha">ASC Nasr de Sebkha</a> withdrew before the 2nd leg.
